name: Unmissable Restaurant
description:
This is my entry for the LudumDare 50 (under the theme "Delay the inevitable") and for the Trijam#163 (under the theme "Buy and sell")

How to play?

Left mouse click = Interact (buy/select in your inventory/sell/pick clocks)

You work in an UNMISSABLE RESTAURANT.

This latter is going to close in 2 minutes ... it's INEVITABLE.

You should earn as much money as possible by BUYING AND SELLING food!

You can also collect clocks to DELAY THE INEVITABLE!

Scores:

My PB: 149

The current WR: 149 by me. (If you want to have your score and your name here, you should send me a proof that you beat this score (In the comment section))

My proof:

Music by JuliusH from Pixabay

Tool used:

Game engine: Unity 2019.4.34f1

Pixelart editor: Piskel

IDE: Visual Studio 2019

Btw Happy Ramadan!
